name: Quicken Heartbeat
summary: You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine.
description:
You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine. You reduce your slowed condition by 1. Alternatively, if you are not slowed, you are quickened 1 during your next turn, and can use your extra action to Stride or Strike.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
